Pengusaha Kumpul Bareng Pemerintah Bahas Ketahanan Pangan
05 Nov 2019, 03:10 by Trio Hamdani


Ketua Umum Kadin Indonesia Rosan P. Roeslani/Foto: Agung Pambudhy

Jakarta - Pengusaha yang tergabung dalam Kamar Dagang dan Industri (Kadin) Indonesia hari ini menggelar Rapat Koordinasi Nasional (Rakornas) dengan perwakilan pemerintah membahas tentang ketahanan pangan.Perwakilan pemerintah dihadiri oleh Menteri Riset dan Teknologi/Kepala Badan Riset dan Inovasi Nasional (Menristek/Kepala BRIN) Bambang Brodjonegoro serta Deputi Bidang Koordinasi Pangan dan Pertanian Kemenko Bidang Perekonomian Musdhalifah Machmud.Sementara dari Kadin dihadiri oleh Ketua Umum Kadin Indonesia Rosan P. Roeslani, Wakil Ketua Umum Kadin Bidang Agribisnis, Pangan dan Kehutanan Franky O. Widjaja, dan Wakil Ketua Umum Kadin Bidang Pengolahan Makanan dan Industri Peternakan Juan P. Adoe.Rosan menjelaskan bahwa ketahanan pangan merupakan hal yang harus diupayakan karena Indonesia memiliki penduduk yang sangat banyak."Ketahanan pangan mutlak kita perlukan apalagi pertumbuhan masyarakat yang hampir 270 juta, perlu pemikiran dari kita semua," kata dia di Hotel Indonesia Kempinski, Jakarta, Selasa (5/11/2019).Indonesia, lanjut dia memang memiliki kekayaan alam yang melimpah, tapi itu perlu didukung dengan teknologi dan inovasi untuk memastikan terjaganya ketahanan pangan."Kita harus adaptasi secara cepat teknologi inovasi sehingga ketahanan pangan terjaga dengan baik. Kita hanya 180 juta hektare lahan tanah kita. Australia lebih 450 juta hektare. Itu perbandingan yang sangat berbeda," tambahnya.Rakornas hari ini mengambil tema "Produktivitas dan Daya Saing Pertanian dan Industri Pangan". Rapat akan merumuskan rekomendasi kepada pemerintah seputar upaya peningkatan produktivitas dan daya saing pertanian juga industri pangan, serta mengkoordinasikan program kerja dunia usaha dan pemerintah ke depan. Entrepreneurs Gathering With The Government Discuss Food Security
05 Nov 2019, 03:10 by Trio Hamdani


Chairman of the Indonesian Chamber of Commerce and Industry Rosan P. Roeslani / Photo: Agung Pambudhy

Jakarta - Entrepreneurs who are members of the Indonesian Chamber of Commerce and Industry (Kadin) today held a National Coordination Meeting (Rakornas) with government representatives discussing food security. Government representatives were attended by the Minister of Research and Technology / Head of the National Research and Innovation Agency (Menristek / Head BRIN) Bambang Brodjonegoro and Deputy Coordinating Minister for Food and Agriculture Coordinating Ministry for Economic Affairs Musdhalifah Machmud. Kadin Food Processing and Animal Husbandry Industry Juan P. Adoe. Rosan explained that food security is something that must be pursued because Indonesia has a very large population. "We absolutely need food security let alone the growth of the community of nearly 270 million, we need to think of all of us, "he said at the Kempinski Indonesia Hotel , Jakarta, Tuesday (11/5/2019). Indonesia, he continued, does have abundant natural wealth, but it needs to be supported with technology and innovation to ensure the preservation of food security. "We must adapt quickly to innovation technology so that food security is maintained with well. We only have 180 million hectares of our land. Australia has more than 450 million hectares. That's a very different comparison, "he added. Today's National Coordinator takes the theme" Productivity and Competitiveness of Agriculture and Food Industry. "The meeting will formulate recommendations to the government regarding efforts to increase productivity and competitiveness of agriculture as well as the food industry, and coordinate the work program of the business community and the government going forward.
